thread.title: BRIEF-Shandong Xinhua Pharmaceutical Says H Share Trading To Continue

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shandong Xinhua Pharmaceutical Says H Share Trading To Continue

organizations.name: xinhua pharmaceutical says h share trading to continue

text:
Jan 24 (Reuters) - Shandong Xinhua Pharmaceutical Co Ltd :
* ‍APPLIED TO SHENZHEN STOCK EXCHANGE FOR SUSPENSION OF TRADING OF A SHARES ON SZSE WITH EFFECT FROM 25 JAN 2018​
* TRADING OF H SHARES OF CO WILL NOT BE AFFECTED AND WILL CONTINUE
* TO RESUME A SHARE TRADING AFTER REVIEWING & APPROVING PLAN TO ISSUE CONSIDERATION SHARES FOR POTENTIAL ACQUISITION​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
